markdownRemark.html:
Monolith vs microservices is a conversation that has come up over and over again, and I'm not quite sure we have an answer yet, and that's really because there is no binary answer. The answer, as much as it sounds ridiculous, is that it depends. It depends on your specific technical and business context, but we won't get into that here. What I wanted to discuss in this article is how scaling a microservice architecture is different to scaling a monolith.

A practical example Let's imagine you need to build a web version of a todo app. Users come, they register, log in, store some todos and they might come back
